title: Neoantigen 1: Fusion-Database-Generation
questions: Why must we generate a customized fusion database for proteogenomics research?
key_points: Create a customized fusion proteomics database from 16SrRNA results.

workflows.name: Gigascience_Fusions_demonstration_STS26T-Gent_Workflow
workflows.title: Gigascience_Fusions_demonstration_STS26T-Gent_Workflow
workflows.description: Create a protein Fusion database through the Arriba workflow

contributors.name: James Johnson
contributors.in_memoriam: James ‘JJ’ Johnson, was a Galaxy community rock star most known for his indispensable contributions to the Galaxy Proteomics community. JJ’s works will live on in so many Galaxy tools and workflows for years to come.
